title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Supercharge security investigations with custom detection & analytics (SEC350)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过自定义检测和分析增强安全调查 (SEC350)
abstract: Learn how to defend your AWS workloads against ransomware and malware threats at scale. Amazon GuardDuty provides malware detection across Amazon EC2 instances, containers, Amazon S3 buckets, and AWS Backup data. Join us to see how to implement automated protection against ransomware, trojans, crypto miners, and other malware through GuardDuty integrated protection capabilities. We'll demonstrate real-world examples and share best practices for rapid threat detection and response.
abstract_cn: 了解如何大规模防御AWS工作负载免受勒索软件和恶意软件威胁。Amazon GuardDuty在Amazon EC2实例、容器、Amazon S3存储桶和AWS Backup数据中提供恶意软件检测。加入我们，了解如何通过GuardDuty集成保护功能实现针对勒索软件、木马、加密货币挖矿程序和其他恶意软件的自动化保护。我们将演示真实案例并分享快速威胁检测和响应的最佳实践。
